protocol_name: Primary Human Liver Dissociation for scSeq
protocol_name_html: Primary Human Liver Dissociation for scSeq
documents: [{"url":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/t8afw26.pdf","file_id":"18368","thumb_url":"/img/extensions/pdf.png","ofn":"29.11.17 Protocol_Human Liver Resection Dissociation for Single-Cell Analysis.pdf"}]

materials.reagent_name: Please see Guidelines for required materials.

groups.group_name: Human Cell Atlas Method Development Community

guidelines:
Reagents to prepare for dissociation:

  • 4 tissue dissociator tubes

  • 4 falcon tube with 20ml Percoll solution 25% in PBS minus Ca+2Mg+2 (cold)

  • 4 falcon tubes with Miltenyi Biotech Debris Removal Solution

  • 1 bottle of PBS (-)Ca+2Mg+2 (warm)

  • 100ml PBS (-)Ca+2Mg+2 (+)EDTA 0.5mM (warm)

  • 100ml PBS (+)Ca+2Mg+2 (filtered and at 37°C)

  • Liberase enzyme solution - 5.2 mg/ml stock (Sigma 000000005466202001)                        0.2 Wünsch units/ml (0.385ml stock + 9.615ml Hepatozyme media)

  • Stop solution: 20% FBS in PBS (-)Ca++Mg++ (cold)

  • Red blood cell lysis buffer: 1:10 dilution of Miltenyi Biotec RBC lysis buffer in ddH2O (MilliQ water)

  • Miltenyi Biotech debris removal solution

  • Hepatozyme media (-)growth factors (cold)

 

Thumbnail image: 

https://www.tutorialspoint.com/digestion_and_absorption/digestive_glands_liver.asp
status_info: Isolation of single cells from the adult human liver for using in single-cell transcriptomic sequencing.

components.data: Wash bulk liver sample in a 50 ml tube with warm PBS (-)Ca+2Mg+2 (+)EDTA. (1/2)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash bulk liver sample in a 50 ml tube with warm PBS (-)Ca+2Mg+2 (+)EDTA. (1/2)

components.data: Wash bulk liver sample in a 50 ml tube with warm PBS (-)Ca+2Mg+2 (+)EDTA. (2/2)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash bulk liver sample in a 50 ml tube with warm PBS (-)Ca+2Mg+2 (+)EDTA. (2/2)

components.data: Distribute liver into even pieces ~2-3g each.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Distribute liver into even pieces ~2-3g each.

components.data: Dice into small pieces in a petri dish with warm PBS (-)Ca+2Mg+2 (+)EDTA.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dice into small pieces in a petri dish with warm PBS (-)Ca+2Mg+2 (+)EDTA.

components.data: Then transfer into tissue dissociator tubes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Then transfer into tissue dissociator tubes.

components.data: Wash samples with warm (37°C) PBS (+)Ca+2Mg+2 to activate collagenase. (1/2)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash samples with warm (37°C) PBS (+)Ca+2Mg+2 to activate collagenase. (1/2)

components.data: Wash samples with warm (37°C) PBS (+)Ca+2Mg+2 to activate collagenase. (2/2)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash samples with warm (37°C) PBS (+)Ca+2Mg+2 to activate collagenase. (2/2)

components.data: Add warm 0.2 Wünsch units/ml Liberase collagenase solution to tissue samples.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add warm 0.2 Wünsch units/ml Liberase collagenase solution to tissue samples.

components.data: Incubate at 37°C, 30 minutes on shaker
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate at 37°C, 30 minutes on shaker

components.data: Process each tube containing tissue through 2 “B” cycles using the “C tube” specific protocol of the Miltenyi Biotech GentleMACS tissue dissociator.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Process each tube containing tissue through 2 “B” cycles using the “C tube” specific protocol of the Miltenyi Biotech GentleMACS tissue dissociator.

components.data: Filter each digestion through a 70 µm filter into its own respective 50 ml falcon tube - use the back of a plunger to push the filtrate through.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Filter each digestion through a 70 µm filter into its own respective 50 ml falcon tube - use the back of a plunger to push the filtrate through.

components.data: Add a 1:1 ratio of 20% FBS stop solution to the collected cell suspension and wash the filter; ~10 ml stop solution.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add a 1:1 ratio of 20% FBS stop solution to the collected cell suspension and wash the filter; ~10 ml stop solution.

components.data: Purification procedure for hepatocyte fraction
components.name: Section

components.data: Centrifuge cell suspensions at 50g, 5 min, 4°C to pellet the hepatocyte fraction.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge cell suspensions at 50g, 5 min, 4°C to pellet the hepatocyte fraction.

components.data: Purification procedure for hepatocyte fraction
components.name: Section

components.data: Collect the NPC-containing supernatant in a separate tube and place on ice for later purification.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Collect the NPC-containing supernatant in a separate tube and place on ice for later purification.

components.data: Purification procedure for hepatocyte fraction
components.name: Section

components.data: Resuspend each hepatocyte pellet in 5 ml of PBS.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend each hepatocyte pellet in 5 ml of PBS.

components.data: Purification procedure for hepatocyte fraction
components.name: Section

components.data:
Add 5 ml of the cell suspension carefully on top of four separate cold 25% percoll solution

(25 ml final volume).
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Add 5 ml of the cell suspension carefully on top of four separate cold 25% percoll solution

(25 ml final volume).

components.data: Purification procedure for hepatocyte fraction
components.name: Section

components.data: Centrifuge the percoll gradients at 1250g, 20 mins, 4°C without brake.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge the percoll gradients at 1250g, 20 mins, 4°C without brake.

components.data: Purification procedure for hepatocyte fraction
components.name: Section

components.data: Aspirate percoll and debris; hepatocytes should pellet at the bottom, while debris should be floating on the top of the gradient.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Aspirate percoll and debris; hepatocytes should pellet at the bottom, while debris should be floating on the top of the gradient.

components.data: Purification procedure for hepatocyte fraction
components.name: Section

components.data: Resuspend each hepatocyte pellet in 2 ml of RT RBC lysis buffer and incubate at RT for 7-10 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend each hepatocyte pellet in 2 ml of RT RBC lysis buffer and incubate at RT for 7-10 minutes.

components.data: Purification procedure for hepatocyte fraction
components.name: Section

components.data: Centrifuge 50g, 5 mins, 4°C and aspirate the red supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge 50g, 5 mins, 4°C and aspirate the red supernatant.

source_data.annotation: The pellet should be light brown in color.
source_data.thread_text: The pellet should be light brown in color.
source_data.body: The pellet should be light brown in color.

components.data: Purification procedure for hepatocyte fraction
components.name: Section

components.data: Resuspend hepatocyte pellets (total/pooled) in 1 ml total cold Hepatozyme media (-)GF.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend hepatocyte pellets (total/pooled) in 1 ml total cold Hepatozyme media (-)GF.

components.data: Purification procedure for hepatocyte fraction
components.name: Section

components.data:
Count cells and dilute to the appropriate concentration using Hepatozyme media. 

Store on ice.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Count cells and dilute to the appropriate concentration using Hepatozyme media. 

Store on ice.

components.data: Purification procedure for NPC fraction
components.name: Section

components.data: Centrifuge the NPC-containing supernatants at 300g, 5 min, 4°C (1st NPC fraction).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge the NPC-containing supernatants at 300g, 5 min, 4°C (1st NPC fraction).

components.data: Purification procedure for NPC fraction
components.name: Section

components.data: Resuspend the pellet in 3.1 ml of PBS.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend the pellet in 3.1 ml of PBS.

components.data: Purification procedure for NPC fraction
components.name: Section

components.data: Centrifuge supernatant at 650g, 7 min, 4°C (2nd NPC fraction).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge supernatant at 650g, 7 min, 4°C (2nd NPC fraction).

components.data: Purification procedure for NPC fraction
components.name: Section

components.data: Resuspend the pellet with the 3.1 ml of PBS from the 1st NPC fraction.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend the pellet with the 3.1 ml of PBS from the 1st NPC fraction.

components.data: Purification procedure for NPC fraction
components.name: Section

components.data: Add 900 μl of debris removal solution to the pooled NPC suspension.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 900 μl of debris removal solution to the pooled NPC suspension.

components.data: Purification procedure for NPC fraction
components.name: Section

components.data: Follow the Miltenyi Biotech Debris Removal protocol to produce a clean cell pellet.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Follow the Miltenyi Biotech Debris Removal protocol to produce a clean cell pellet.

components.data: Purification procedure for NPC fraction
components.name: Section

components.data: Resuspend each NPC pellet in 2 ml of RT RBC lysis buffer.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend each NPC pellet in 2 ml of RT RBC lysis buffer.

components.data: Purification procedure for NPC fraction
components.name: Section

components.data: Incubate resuspended NPC pellet at RT for ~10 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate resuspended NPC pellet at RT for ~10 minutes.

components.data: Purification procedure for NPC fraction
components.name: Section

components.data: Centrifuge at 650g, 5 min, 4°C to pellet cells.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge at 650g, 5 min, 4°C to pellet cells.

components.data: Purification procedure for NPC fraction
components.name: Section

components.data: Aspirate red supernatant and resuspend cell pellet in 1 ml of cold Hepatozyme media (-)GF.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Aspirate red supernatant and resuspend cell pellet in 1 ml of cold Hepatozyme media (-)GF.

components.data: Purification procedure for NPC fraction
components.name: Section
